message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $200. I think you'll find it's a great deal for what it offers.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to pay that price for the item.
Thanks for your offer, Bob.  I understand your perspective, but I can't go as low as $120.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $160?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget at $160. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product.
